original_title: Some Day All This Will Be Yours
overview: A queer autofiction comedy/horror short, Some Day All This Will Be Yours was shot in the filmmaker's childhood home. The film follows an increasingly strange pregnant woman giving her unborn child a tour of its inheritance. Amidst a riot of crumbling 1970s interior design, Some Day uncannily twists the tropes of motherhood, home, and family legacy.
title: Some Day All This Will Be Yours
